seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, education requirement is bachelor's level

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence', responsibilities include ETL, reporting, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, visualization, and ETL tools like DataStage and Informatica - all batch-oriented

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities - focused on individual technical delivery

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice-to-have skills include AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure - no primary cloud specified

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure are all mentioned as preferred experience

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting, and ETL tools which are typically batch-oriented

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as nice-to-have, which is a cloud-native orchestrator

storage_layer.evidence: BI/DW focus with Cognos reporting suggests data warehouse environment

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, Maharashtra, India implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, location restricted to India

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location restricted to India, no mention of student visa support

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies authorization to work in India is required, no citizenship requirement specified

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM suggests W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned, only general reference to 'deep technical expertise' and 'innovation'

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with business and technical team members, suggesting collaboration with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions or advancement opportunities

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or role changes

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks mentioned in the job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between required (Cognos, UNIX, 3+ years) and nice-to-have (cloud platforms, ETL tools) skills

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on BI/DW reporting, visualization, and ETL with specific tool requirements

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience requirement is reasonable for mid-level BI/data engineering role with specific tool expertise
